description: That's the lad. Such a chunk. What a boi. Whup Whup. Gonna take a nap now.
basic_logg_encouragement: Whew, what a workout. Well done us, now it's time for a break.
startscreen_encouragement: I'm still recovering from the last time we went [workout_name]. That was at least two naps full of exercising!
startscreen_nudging: I've been wondering... we haven't been [workout_name] for a while. Would you want to have a go at that again? Totally fine if you don't though!

basic_logg_encouragement: I'm a penguin and you are doing great!
startscreen_encouragement: [workout_name] with you makes me feel both strong and cute. Double threat!
startscreen_nudging: 9/10 penguins agree we should go [workout_name] again!

description: Cute birdy - chirp chirp buddy, chirp chirp
basic_logg_encouragement: This bird thinks you're doing amazing!
startscreen_encouragement: Let's get this bread! Mhhhh, bread...
startscreen_nudging: Wanna go for a round of [workout_name] again?
